resources.string:
Developed at Purdue University (2011) by:
Maaz Humayun
Nick Hendrickx
Sohail Mehra

Team Tab: Allows you to view developers' profiles.

Vote Tab: Allows you to vote for what you want to see on the video wall.

Audio Tab: Allows you to select audio channel for something playing on the screen.

Video Tab: Allows you to stream video from your Android phone camera to the video wall.
